18#include "Matrix.h"
19
20#include <cstdint>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23
24// TODO: If kept at all, this should be replaced by `using ByteMatrix = Matrix<uint8_t>;` to be consistent with ByteArray
25// This non-template class is kept for now to stay source-compatible with oder versions of the library.
26
27class ByteMatrix : public Matrix<int8_t>
28{
29public:
30 ByteMatrix(int width, int height, int8_t val = 0) : Matrix<int8_t>(width, height, val) {}
31 ByteMatrix(ByteMatrix&&) = default;
32 ByteMatrix& operator=(ByteMatrix&&) = default;
33};
34
35} // ZXing
36
